        public void yearOfPlenty(int playerIndex,
                         ResourceType resource1,
                         ResourceType resource2)
        Executes "Year of Plenty Dev Card", removes the dev card from the players hand. Awards the player any two resources of his/her choosing
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the player playing the dev card
        resource1 - the resource the player wants
        resource2 - the resource the player wants

      • roadBuilding

        public void roadBuilding(int playerIndex,
                         EdgeLocation spot1,
                         EdgeLocation spot2)
        Executes "Road Building Dev Card", removes the dev card from the players hand. Awards the player with the ability to place 2 free roads
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the index of the player building the road
        spot1 - the location for a road being built
        spot2 - the location for the second road being built

      • soldier

        public void soldier(int playerIndex,
                    int victimIndex,
                    HexLocation location)
        Executes "Soldier Dev Card", removes the dev card from the players hand. Awards the player allowing him or her to move the robber and rob a player
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the player playing the dev card
        victimIndex - the victim of the dev card
        location - the robber location

      • monopoly

        public void monopoly(int playerIndex,
                     ResourceType resource)
        Executes "Monopoly Dev Card", removes the dev card from the players hand. Takes every resource, of a specified type, from all other players and adds them to the player hand
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the player playing the Monopoly card
        resource - the resource the player wishes to steal

      • monument

        public void monument(int playerIndex)
        Executes "Monument Dev Card", removes the dev card from the players hand. Awards the player one victory point.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the player playing the dev card

      • maritimeTrade

        public void maritimeTrade(int playerIndex,
                          int ratio,
                          ResourceType inputResource,
                          ResourceType outputResource)
        Executes "Maritime Trade", subtracts the given resources from the instigator and add the get resources to the instigator.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - the player doing the maritime trade
        ratio - the ratio to trade the resources at
        inputResource - the input resource type
        outputResource - the output resource type
